scripts.clean: lerna run clean && rimraf node_modules python_modules
scripts.setup: yarn --production=false && lerna exec --concurrency 1 --stream -- yarn --production=false && lerna run setup
scripts.docker-dev: cd packages/ && docker-compose down && docker-compose up -d --build
scripts.docker-dev-clean-testdb: cd packages/ && docker-compose down && docker volume rm yagnostic-api-dev-db
scripts.docker-dev-clean-api-testdb: cd packages/ && docker-compose down && docker volume rm yagnostic-api-dev-db
scripts.docker-prod: docker-compose down && lerna run build && docker-compose up -d --build && docker-compose logs -f
scripts.docker-test-deploy: COMPOSE_PROJECT_NAME=yagnostic-blaize COMPOSE_FILE=docker-compose.yml:docker-compose.yagnostic.blaize.tech.yml docker-compose config | docker stack deploy -c - yagnostic-blaize
scripts.docker-test-ls: docker stack ls && docker service ls
scripts.docker-ps: docker ps | grep yagnostic && docker volume ls | grep yagnostic
scripts.docker-prune: docker system prune -f && docker volume prune -f
